org.kynosarges.tektosyne.geometry

Enum Compass

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Compass>
      • org.kynosarges.tektosyne.geometry.Compass
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Compass>

    public enum Compass
extends java.lang.Enum<Compass>
    Specifies the eight major compass directions. Specifies the four cardinal compass points, and the four ordinal points halfway between them. Each direction is associated with its compass angle in degrees, starting with zero for NORTH and continuing clockwise in 45 degree increments.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      EAST
      Specifies 90 degrees.
      NORTH
      Specifies zero degrees.
      NORTH_EAST
      Specifies 45 degrees.
      NORTH_WEST
      Specifies 315 degrees.
      SOUTH
      Specifies 180 degrees.
      SOUTH_EAST
      Specifies 135 degrees.
      SOUTH_WEST
      Specifies 225 degrees.
      WEST
      Specifies 270 degrees.

      • degrees

        public int degrees()
        Gets the angle associated with the Compass point.
        Returns:
        the angle in degrees, within the interval [0, 359]

      • fromDegrees

        public static Compass fromDegrees(int degrees)
        Gets the Compass point at the specified angle. Returns the closest Compass point in counter-clockwise direction if degrees does not exactly match an existing point.
        Parameters:
        degrees - the angle in degrees whose Compass point to find
        Returns:
        the Compass point at the specified degrees
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if degrees is outside [0, 359]
